instructions.name: cancel_listing
docs: Cancel a listing and return funds

instructions.name: close_expired_listing
docs: Close an expired listing (anyone can call)

accounts.name: source_whitelist
docs: Optional: required when platform.whitelist_enabled is true

accounts.name: dest_whitelist
docs: Optional: required when platform.whitelist_enabled is true

errors.name: UnauthorizedAuthority
errors.msg: Unauthorized: Only platform authority can perform this action

errors.name: InvalidFeeConfiguration
errors.msg: Invalid fee configuration: must be between 0 and 1000 basis points

errors.name: InvalidDurationBounds
errors.msg: Invalid duration bounds: min must be less than max

errors.name: InvalidAmount
errors.msg: Invalid amount: must be greater than zero

errors.name: AmountTooSmall
errors.msg: Amount too small: below minimum trade amount

errors.name: SameTokenMints
errors.msg: Invalid token mints: source and destination must be different

errors.name: InvalidListingStatus
errors.msg: Invalid listing status for this operation

errors.name: MaxListingsReached
errors.msg: User has reached maximum active listings limit

errors.name: VaultDepositFailed
errors.msg: Failed to transfer tokens to vault

errors.name: VaultWithdrawalFailed
errors.msg: Failed to withdraw tokens from vault

types.name: FeeCollectorUpdated
docs: Emitted when fee collector is updated

fields.name: amount_destination_total
docs: Original amount of destination tokens wanted

fields.name: amount_destination_remaining
docs: Remaining amount of destination tokens wanted

fields.name: max_slippage_bps
docs: Maximum slippage tolerance in basis points

types.name: ListingCancelled
docs: Emitted when a listing is cancelled

types.name: ListingCreated
docs: Emitted when a new listing is created

types.name: ListingUpdated
docs: Emitted when a listing is updated

fields.name: whitelist_enabled
docs: Whitelist enabled (if true, only whitelisted tokens allowed)

types.name: PlatformConfigUpdated
docs: Emitted when platform config is updated

types.name: SwapExecuted
docs: Emitted when a swap is executed

fields.name: mint
docs: The token mint this entry refers to

fields.name: is_whitelisted
docs: Whether the token is currently whitelisted

fields.name: updated_at
docs: Timestamp when this entry was created or last updated

types.name: TokenWhitelistUpdated
docs: Emitted when token whitelist is updated

types.name: UserPreferencesUpdated
docs: Emitted when user preferences are updated

types.name: UserProfileCreated
docs: Emitted when a user profile is created
